114.content:
“You can’t be serious.” Jack said to his captain as he read over his new assignment.

“I’m afraid so Jack. This is the last one. The big one. You complete this and you retire a hero. Double benefits and pension for life.” The captain said.

This new mission was something out of a novel or movie for Jack. He wanted nothing to do with this weird sci-if crap, but it seemed it like he had no other choice.

His mission was to go undercover as a teenager. Not just a teenager either but a girl, and a cheerleader to boot. His mission was to get close to the daughter of Mafia Boss, Ivan Drasko. A Russian mobster with an absolute monstrous reputation. His enemies had been known to been found hacked up into pieces...

Ivan came to America as a teenager and started a family here. On the outside he was a typical family man. He owned a local car dealership and paid his taxes and looked like anyone else. However beneath all that was a sadistic and cruel gangster with a string of murders and disappearances tied to him that ran into the dozens.

It seemed his only real weakness was his family. His wife Laura and his daughter Natalie. Laura was a typical housewife. She drank wine like most people drink water. She had multiple plastic surgeries to make herself look younger and sexier including fake boobs, butt implants, liposuction, etc. She was a dumb as it gets and anything she might or might not know about her husbands true business would be useless in court.

His Daughter however was a different story. She was Daddy’s little princess. Spoiled rotten and given anything she wanted. She was now the cheer captain of her high school. She was one of ruling class of high school seniors at her school. She was a “mean girl” a heartbreaker and kind of a slut by her reputation. She dated older guys, went to parties, drank, smoked, drugs, anything she wanted. For her 18th birthday she got a boob job as a present because she always wanted D cups. However where her mom was a dumb housewife, Nat seemed to inherit her daddy’s smarts when it came to running her own little school empire. She even had teachers under her thumb so she never had to do homework yet still got good grades.

Jack’s mission was to be sent in as a “distributor” His female body was to be designed in every way to get under Natalie’s skin. She would be hotter, sexier, more flexible and athletic. A natural rival for Natalie. This combined with Natalie’s incredible ego and competitive attitude should allow Jack to get close to her and hopefully get her to expose her true nature. Once she does anything Mafia related they bring her in and use her to expose her dad.

This wasn’t going to be an easy mission. Highly advanced hormone therapy and chromosome reconstruction surgery was to be used to build Jack’s new body followed by a month of training to act like a teenager and expert cheerleader. He would be placed with a proxy family who sole purpose to is pose as his new parents during the mission.

This was his last mission as Jack nervously signed the paperwork not knowing what the future held for him.

Furthermore not a single trace of body hair remained. Those surgery geeks really know their stuff. Jack thought to himself as he moved his hand back and forth to confirm that the reflection was truly his. His eyes drifted south to his vagina, not even a sign a pubic hair. Jack lamented briefly for his lost genitalia and turned to see his back. He saw a chubby butt reflected in the mirror and couldn't keep himself from laughing out loud. "Haha! Cute butt, kid." Jack said to himself.

His handler would be coming along soon to collect him for training, Jack stopped laughing and reminded himself of the importance of his mission. If this mission is successful Roberto Romano would be off the street permanently.

But was the cost too great? This wan't some magical transformation that could be undone once the mission was over, this had been surgical, it had hurt. Due to the nature of the surgery he wouldn't even grow out of this. Jack was forever an 8 year old girl and the gravity of the task that awaited him made him feel like one too.

Jack jumped to his feet with determination. "If you touch me with that stick again I'm gonna-" Jack started but stopped when he suddenly realised that Amanda was almost twice his height and towered over him. "I-I'm gonna..." He stuttered.

As you're driving to the lab you look at the picture of the girl again. "Damn Jack, what have you gotten yourself into", you mutter? They were very sketchy on the details of your transformation. You assume it's going to be some sort of advanced plastic surgery, but really have no idea. You figure that's why they selected you. Aside from your training and vast experience you're not that big of a guy. You're below average for a man, but that's always made you work harder, made you stronger as far as you're concerned. Your Mom was also a dance instructor. You'd help her out with her classes. You smile to yourself as you remember that one of the classes she taught was adult dancing and pole dancing. It was every teenage boy's dream. What really has you confused is that they said physically you'd be ready to begin your assignment tomorrow. You never heard of any surgery you could recover that quickly from.

You pull up to the building where the lab is located and your concerns increase. The security there is tight. You recognize the swagger of the guards from your time in the service. You'd bet a weeks pay they're special forces, or at least were. The weapons they're carrying are high end and fully auto. You're waved through and make it to the building where you're escorted in. After passing through several other checkpoints you make it to the lab. from what you can see it's not equipped for surgery. Doctor Jacks, the doctor you spoke to at police headquarters walks up as you're looking around. "Is there something wrong detective", he asks? You look directly at the doctor and say, "Yes, this doesn't look like any surgery room I ever seen. Everything else I've seen so far screams government project and by the security a very classified government project. That begs another question. Why contact a local police agency offering to use this classified tech to help them bring down a local mob boss"? Doctor Jacks smiles and says, "I can see why you were selected. That was a very good observation and mostly true. Why would we want to help you take down a local mob boss"? You raise an eyebrow. You're good at word games, but are usually the one playing them. "My guess is that he's not that local and threatens either this project, or the country somehow. You want him taken out in a way that there won't be a connection to the feds though", you offer. Doctor Jacks replies with, "Very good. Also if you're found out the government will disavow any knowledge and you'll be stuck as a woman". You feel your chest tighten some.

The Doctor walks you into the lab. You finally work up the nerve to ask the question. "I take it that this is a little more than just advanced plastic surgery", you say. The Doctor turns and says, "I guess I can brief you now. What we have perfected is................

"What the hell do mean", you blurt out? Doctor Jacks pulls out a file and not just any file, but your military file. "You took part in a experimental trial for a new anti-nerve agent during the Gulf War. It wasn't an anti nerve agent. It was the first field trial for the nano-meds. They were designed to repair battlefield injuries by augmenting the subjects own healing abilities", he says. You rub your arm remembering that. The doctor then continues, "It wasn't exactly successful. Several subjects developed what came to be known as Gulf War syndrome. A few, very few it worked. have you ever wondered how you survived so many close calls. Those close calls were closer than you realized. Part of the nano-meds programming includes suppressing traumatic memories. This also caused some issues. You are one of the few that adjusted well. That is the reason you're the one that must go on this mission. What we're going to do is reprogram your nano-meds with a new template. They will transform you completely. Not even a DNA test will indicate you've ever been anything but a woman. It will be painful, but the nano-meds will block all memories of the transformation". You don't know what to say. 134.content:
Jack walked down to the crime laboratory like a condemned man. It was a place where no officer on duty liked to go, because this wasn't like a typical lab. Two years ago the government started a new program to equip law enforcement with modern-age technology, using bizarre and sometimes unethical research methods.

Government-employed scientists scurried around the laboratory like insects, their coke-bottle lenses staring blankly back at whatever officers found their way down there. The whole room glowed a sickly green colour. It smelled like sulphur.

"Name and identification, please..." Grunted a balding, middle-aged scientist. His back curved slightly forward and his arms and hands were stubby things jutting out from his white lab coat, giving him a beetle-like appearance. Jack couldn't see his eyes behind his thick glasses.

"Jack O'Rourke, number 014726." He presented his badge, and the scientist scanned a laser beam over it.

"Excellent," He sniffed. "Follow me, please..."

Jack followed the scientist through several security checkpoints separating each chamber within the laboratory. At each checkpoint, he gave his name and ID, and one scientist handed him over to the next. This was done, he was told, so that no one scientist would know where the machine was located within the lab.

The machine in question was top secret. Even the police chief of the whole precinct didn't know anything about it. It was delivered in a wooden crate the night before by government workers. All the police chief knew, and what he relayed down the chain of command to Jack's boss, was that this machine would allow Jack to infiltrate the Russo crime syndicate. Nothing more, nothing less.

Finally, Jack entered a chamber with no other doors. In contrast to the others, this room was well lit. Two reclining chairs lay in the centre, positioned for two people to lie back like at a dentist's office. A large supercomputer hummed and clicked in the background. Several thick cables and wires ran out from the supercomputer into a pair of helmets, which lay at rest on a table next to the two chairs.

This room was not empty when Jack entered with the scientist. Inside was another insect-like scientist. Along with a woman.

"What's the big idea here? Who is this guy?" She asked.

Jack was equally confused; the young woman looked like she had no business inside a police station or crime laboratory. She looked like she was in her mid-twenties. She was thin, with strawberry blonde hair cascading down a pair of narrow shoulders that were dwarfed by the huge, bolted-on tits resting on her chest. Clearly fake, they had to have been at least H-cups (not even Jack's wife had boobs these big, and his wife was much larger than this girl. He guessed she couldn't have been more than 100 pounds soaking wet).

Her nipples jutted out from the fuzzy pink tube top she was wearing, which also had golden tassels dangling from the sides. Her midriff was showing, and her black microskirt barely covered her ass cheeks. Her skin was pale but free of tattoos as far as Jack could tell.

"What the hell is this?" Jack muttered. "What are you doing here, lady?"

"That's what I'd like to know!" She struck a pose, placing her hands on her hips. "These guys won't tell me anything. Do you know where we are at least?"

Jack gazed at the bug-like scientists, who were busy calibrating the machine, buzzing about it like flies. He answered, "Yeah. We're somewhere deep inside the crime laboratory of the Metrovale police station, precinct number 43."

She stalked over to Jack, looking him up and down. "So can you, like, get us out of here then? This place is way creepy, no offense."

Jack tried the door, but it was locked. He was about to pull aside one of the scientists to start explaining themselves, when the police chief entered the room.

"Ah! Sorry I'm late. Had a ten-fifteen to process, O'Rourke." The police chief shook his hand. Then, turning to the young woman, he bowed. "Sorry for keeping you waiting, miss."

"That's okay, can you just tell me what happened?" She repeated annoyed. "The last thing I remember I was dancing for a regular over at Score's... then I find myself here."

While Jack had suspected it, she had confirmed it. The woman was an 'exotic dancer' at the seedy strip club in the bad part of town. Jack was a faithful husband and didn't frequent Score's, but he was plenty familiar with the place due to the number of arrests he made around there. It was not a safe place to be at night.

"Your questions will be answered momentarily." Said the police chief. "Including yours, O'Rourke. I'm sorry I can't explain right now. What I need is for each of you to lie down in one of these chairs."

"What? Why?" She backed away, hitting her backside against the table. "What the fuck is this shit?"

The police chief snapped his fingers. The two scientists who were buzzing about the machine converged on the poor woman. They dragged her, kicking and screaming, onto one of the chairs. They fastened her wrists and ankles into metal clasps welded into the sides. Then they tied a gag around her mouth. Her screams came out as muffled chokes until one scientist injected her with a liquid causing her to pass out.

Seeing this upset Jack greatly. The police chief sighed, "I'm sorry you had to see that, O'Rourke."

"If you think I'm going to let those bozos do that to me, chief..." Growled Jack, steeling himself against the two drone-like scientists standing idly beside the chair.

"Violence won't be necessary." The police chief held up a hand. "I figure I owe you an explanation for what you're about to go through."

"That would be very helpful, chief." Jack said through gritted teeth.

The chief guided Jack around and behind the big machine, showing him how it works and what the scientists will be instructed to do. "This machine was originally designed to help develop psychokinesis in its subjects. The ability to move objects around with one's mind." He explained to Jack. "However, for reasons we don't understand, the opposite happened. The machine perfected a way to move minds around between objects."

Jack couldn't believe his ears. "So you're telling me this some kind of... body swapping machine?" He thought such technology was impossible outside of the realm of science fiction.

"You could say that, yes." Nodded the chief. "You place a helmet on each subject, throw on the switch, and each subject will receive the mind of the other. In theory, there's no reason that its effects should be limited to humans... or living matter."

Then the penny drops. Jack glances over at the strawberry blonde's sleeping form reclined in the chair. "You — You can't seriously expect me to — "

"Yes?" The chief leaned forward.

"To — To switch bodies with that woman, do you?" Jack sputtered. "What the hell would that accomplish, chief?"

The chief pulled Jack in close by the shoulder, confiding in him like a brother. "Listen to me, O'Rourke. You're the finest god damn officer in our precinct. Your mental and emotional acuity is higher than any other officer I've seen in ten years. Now I want you to use your problem-solving skills, will ya? Where did she say she worked before coming here?"

"At Score's," Answered Jack. "Everyone knows about it. It's a titty bar in the bad part of town. Known to harbor criminals, smugglers, and gangsters. A lot of bad shit."

"That's right. Were you informed as to why you're here?" The chief asked next.

"I was told this would be an undercover operation." Jack said, and then it all made sense. "So you want me to infiltrate the titty bar as that blonde broad over there?" He thumbed over to her skeptically. "She can't even defend herself against these two scientist goons here, chief. She has no strength, no endurance training."

"Yes, O'Rourke, it is a risk." The chief nodded. "But there's a lot at stake here. We have another informant in Score's who tells us that the Russo crime syndicate is preparing to expand outward. We can't allow that to happen."

"Who's the informant?" Jack asked.

"They will make themselves known to you, when you get to work there." He answered.

Jack frowned. "I can't dance around and shake that girl's ass out there for strangers, chief!"

"You can, and you will, O'Rourke." Ordered the police chief. "You're in too deep to back out now. If it's any consolation, we have upgraded the machine to allow subjects to retain portions of their old skill sets. So you'll receive this woman's muscle memory and knowledge of how to please a crowd, while keeping your police training. And this woman will receive memories of your friends and family, so she can act like you when she is off duty."

Jack had forgotten about the other half of the swap. That this stripper would take over his body and life. "You can't let her impersonate me! What about my family? Don't they have a right to know?"

"Negative, O'Rourke. The fewer people who know about this technology, the better." The chief said flatly. "Rest assured — we will give her enough to live your life without too much disruption when you complete your mission."

"And how long is this mission supposed to last?" Jack asked, as the two scientists began escorting him onto the reclining chair. They fastened a helmet over his hair, screwing it on his head tight. Finally, they restrained his wrists and ankles in metal clasps.

"As long as necessary. Good luck, O'Rourke." The chief said, before giving the signal to throw the switch. That was all Jack remembered before passing out.

When Jack awakened...

Naomi took a deep breath. She struggled to get out from Ken's embrace as she whispered to his ears: K stand for Kenneth. A raven and eagle soar on the night sky. Seven-twentynine-comma-eight. Go to sleep, Ken.

Suddenly, his body stiffened. His tight grasp on her ample breast loosened as he slumped over his wife's body. Two seconds later, Naomi heard him snoring.

She shifted his body to the bed side. He slept like a baby. The command had triggered the hypnosis planted in his mind that would make him obey his master's - in this case, Naomi's - command.

Naomi killed the switch and the room became dark. The only light came from the television which still displaying the running text. She walked toward the window and took a peek outside at the street . The view looked tranquil and sedated. There was nobody as everyone in the suburban were already sleeping.

She moved back to the bed and took the remote control. She pressed a series of button and the TV displayed an interior of bedroom which belonged to the oldest daughter, Miley Benson. The room was typical girly, full of posters of actors and musicians. On the bed, the sixteen year old was sleeping soundly. She was clad in a pink tank top and white boy shorts. Her long mane of blonde tresses was all over her pillow.

Naomi pressed another buttons and the display changed to another girl's bedroom. Charlotte was still awake, reading a novel. She's fourteen years old with short brown hair and a little bit nerdy.

Naomi pressed another button to activate the sleeping gas intake into Charlotte's room. She smiled as she saw her daughter yawned several times. In less than one minute, she dozed off.

Just to make sure, Naomi also activated the same procedure to Miley's room. The suburban mom had to be in the safe side before she proceed to the next step.

Calling her handler.

She went to the dressing table and took out a small cellphone from a secret drawer. As she dialed a number, she caught her image on the mirror. Under the oversized T-shirt and pink lounge pants lied her curvy, luscious body.

"It's been a while," she said. There was a sad tone in her melodic voice. It was like she wasn't ready to face the person she's calling.

There was a click. And a deep voice answered.

"Hello."

"It's me. Naomi Benson."

"Passcode please."

"Four-four-zero-six-ring-of-fire."

"Confirmed. Have you neutralized your company?" he said, referring to Naomi's husband and daughters.

"Yes. They're all sleeping. The perimeter is checked and safe"

"Okay, Jack. You can drop the camouflage."

"It's been a while," Naomi repeated the line she said before with a masculine voice. The words sounded odd sliding from her lips.

"Yes, indeed. You've been conducting your current assignment in a flawless manner, posing as a the suburban mom while protecting the witnesses. Your achievement means that this deep-cover program can be continued and up-scaled."

"I couldn't do it without the bodysuit. It helps the me playing the role perfectly. And don't forget the hypnosis. Who ever designs is genius," 'Naomi' said as she peeled her visage. Her facial skin become distorted followed by Velcro rip echoing in the bedroom.

A man's face appeared underneath the suburban mom's mask.

"So what's the emergency? I saw the coded message in the news?"

"Yes, there is an assignment for you, Jack."
